text: 🚨New Report: The High Cost of Healthcare Affordability Crisis in America! 💸🏥 Did you know? 🤔 Americans can only afford $97/month for out-of-pocket medical costs on average! 😱 Preventive visits, prescription drugs, mental health care, and diagnostic testing are being skipped or delayed due to unaffordable costs! 💔 It's time for a change! 💪 PayZen is here to help with AI-powered solutions for better patient satisfaction & improved financial outcomes for healthcare providers! 💼👨‍⚕️
